headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Ready to Rumble
content:
There’s a careful balance to strike in the arena. Every fireball means another surge in viewer numbers - but nobody wants the fun to be over too quickly.

If you want to battle in your own rig, you’ll need to choose the right vehicle for the job, so head over to www.arenawar.tv and check out an array of battle-worthy options.

Some are ready to go as soon as they’re delivered; some start life as humble road cars, with arena workshop upgrade options that’ll have them ready to burn in no time.
